title.narrative: Mekong region forest and climate support

description.narrative: Local communities need information of better form and accuracy to be able to access forest product and services markets and obtain a higher share in value creation. Payments environmental services including carbon mitigation are increasingly available but local communities are as yet unable to capture these markets or even comprehend them. They need better information about their forest resources to be able to access such schemes. The goal of the project: Local people gaining additional benefits through imp roved access to forest product and carbon markets and payments for environmental services, contributing to poverty reduction,enhancement of environmental conditions, and mitigation and better adaptation to climate change.
